text: Sitarganj (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is one of the seventy electoral Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand state in India. Sitarganj Legislative Assembly constituency is a part of Nainital-Udhamsingh Nagar constituency.The Election Commission of India. p. 509\. title: Sitarganj (Uttarakhand Assembly constituency)
